actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to eliminate employment discrimination on the basis of military discharge status.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (Equal Employment Opportunity) to make discrimination on the basis of military discharge status an unlawful employment practice.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to eliminate employment discrimination on the basis of military discharge status.
